package com.io;

import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;

public class FileWriterDemo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
	try {
		FileWriter fw = new FileWriter("C:\\Users\\yalla\\eclipse-workspace\\java Basics\\src\\com\\io/java.txt");
	fw.write("this is aariv tech ");
	fw.flush();
	fw.close();
	} catch (IOException e) {
		// TODO Auto-generated catch block
		e.printStackTrace();
	}

	}

}
